time:PackRat.NAME: Pack Rat
time:PackRat.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Buffer. NL Gain a random Potion. NL Exhaust.

time:Gravitas.NAME: Gravitas
time:Gravitas.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL time:Suspend a *Dramatic *Entrance.

time:Suspension.NAME: Suspension
time:Suspension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Suspend 1 card in your hand.

time:CosmicChaos.NAME: Cosmic Chaos
time:CosmicChaos.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL time:Suspend this.

time:DarkEnergy.NAME: Dark Energy
time:DarkEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL time:Suspend a *Blur.

time:Feeble.NAME: Feeble
time:Feeble.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain 1 Vulnerable and draw 1 card.

time:Feeblemind.NAME: Feeblemind
time:Feeblemind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL time:Suspend a *Feeble.

time:HammerBlow.NAME: Hammer Blow
time:HammerBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all time:Suspended cards.'

time:InfusePower.NAME: Infuse Power
time:InfusePower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase all damage on time:Suspended cards by !M!.

time:WatchStrike.NAME: Watch Strike
time:WatchStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

time:CosmicWave.NAME: Cosmic Wave
time:CosmicWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and 1 Slow to ALL enemies. NL Suspend 1 *Doubt.

time:DeepFreeze.NAME: Deep Freeze
time:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retrieve 1 fewer time:Suspended card next turn.

time:DistantDodge.NAME: Distant Dodge
time:DistantDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL time:Suspend this. NL When *Retrieved, gain !B! Block and discard this.

time:InfuseDefense.NAME: Infuse Defense
time:InfuseDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase all Block on time:Suspended cards by !M!.

time:MirrorImage.NAME: Mirror Image
time:MirrorImage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card in your discard pile to time:Suspend. NL Exhaust.
time:MirrorImage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card in your discard pile to time:Suspend.

time:Planning.NAME: Planning
time:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Suspend the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

time:Wander.NAME: Wander
time:Wander.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw 1 fewer card.

time:TemporalBarrier.NAME: Temporal Barrier
time:TemporalBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemies that attack you this turn gain !M! Slow.

time:DimensionShift.NAME: Dimension Shift
time:DimensionShift.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL time:Suspend a copy of the next card you play. NL Exhaust.
time:DimensionShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL time:Suspend a copy of the next 2 cards you play. NL Exhaust.

time:InfuseEnergy.NAME: Infuse Energy
time:InfuseEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of all time:Suspended cards by 1.

time:StasisStrike.NAME: Stasis Strike
time:StasisStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL time:Suspend this and increase its damage by !M!.

time:TimeBomb.NAME: Time Bomb
time:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: time:Suspend this. When *Retrieved, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and discard this.

time:PastBlast.NAME: Past Blast
time:PastBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw the top card of your discard pile.

time:Chronomancy.NAME: Chronomancy
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Slow starts as if 2 cards have already been played.

time:Continuance.NAME: Continuance
time:Continuance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you *Retrieve a card, gain !M! Block.
